value.title: Convert Flat List to Table in Power BI   Pivot Without a Set Key Column Using Power Query
value.excerpt: The scenario I am explaining today is a very specific use case, However, I have seen examples similar to this happens very often. value.title: Fibonacci Sequence   Understanding the Power Query Recursive Function for Power BI
value.excerpt: Recursive functions in Power Query are not very popular, but sometimes very helpful when in need. In this post, I'll explain what a recursive function is, how it works, and explain it through a famous recursive example of Fibonacci Sequence. Download the code, and Power BI file from my blog article here:

value.title: Fuzzy Grouping in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: I have explained previously what fuzzy matching in Power BI is and how to use it. In this article and video, I’ll explain Fuzzy grouping. value.title: Unpivot in Power BI and Power Query Transforming Budget Data from Columns to Rows
value.excerpt: Turning columns to rows or rows to columns is easy with Power Query and Power BI. There are many situations that you get a name, value data source, and wants to convert that into columns with values underneath. On the other hand, many times you get multiple columns and want to change it to name, value
